Detailed Description

MPU WUGEN related APIs.

This file contains the APIs for configuring MPU_WUGEN for ARM Cortex-A15 on AM57x and TDA2xx SOC's.

Function Documentation

void MPU_WUGEN_0_Disable ( uint16_t  intrNum)

This API disables the CPU0 wakeup event for requested interrupt.

Parameters
intrNum- Interrupt number
Returns
None.

void MPU_WUGEN_Init ( void  )

Address offset per register.

This API is used to initialize MPU_WUGEN. All wakeup events will be disabled after initialization.
